name: A black obsidian sword with a spike (2h)
data: It has impressive weapon class for its type (impressive in general).
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It does electric damage a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users cold resistance somewhat.
It modifies user's resistance against magical damage.
It modifies user's resistance against cold damage.
